title: Blue Ridge Parkway: Commercial Use Authorization
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Commercial Use Authorization                Commercial Use Authorization Permits       Commercial Use Authorization (CUA) (also known as Outfitter Guide/Permits with the U.S. Forest Service) are required for engaging in any business within the park. Examples include guided bicycle tours, photography workshops, hiking and rock climbing activities. Please read Commercial Use Authorization - Guidelines, Requirements, Fees and Application before submitting an application.
